data.name: WelcomeMessage
data.value: Great! Now, let's set up your master password for AliasVault.
data.comment: Assistant welcome message for password setup step

data.name: ImportantNote
data.value: Important: This master password will be used to encrypt your vault. It should be a long, complex string that you can remember. If you forget this password, your data will be permanently inaccessible.

data.name: SecurityPoint1
data.value: Your master password never leaves your device
data.comment: First security point about password privacy

data.name: SecurityPoint2
data.value: The server has no access to your unencrypted data
data.comment: Second security point about server access

data.name: SecurityPoint3
data.value: Even the server admin cannot restore your access if you forget this password
data.comment: Third security point about password recovery

data.name: PasswordTooShortError
data.value: Master password must be at least 10 characters long.
data.comment: Error message for password too short

data.name: ConfirmPasswordPrompt
data.value: Confirm your password by entering it again.

data.name: PasswordsMismatchError
data.comment: Error message when passwords don't match
